thread.title: Dr. Vartan Mardirossian Speaks at SCC (Transgender Conference) in Ft. Lauderdale about FFS Techniques, Showed Results and Answered Questions
thread.title_full: Dr. Vartan Mardirossian Speaks at SCC (Transgender Conference) in Ft. Lauderdale about FFS Techniques, Showed Results and Answered Questions - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Dr. Vartan Mardirossian Speaks at SCC (Transgender Conference) in Ft. Lauderdale about FFS Techniques, Showed Results and Answered Questions
text:
Dr. Vartan Mardirossian, a facial feminization surgeon, recently spoke at a transgender conference in Fort Lauderdale.
 FORT LAUDERDALE, FL, October 23, Dr. Vartan Mardirossian is a well-known facial feminization surgeon who practices in Jupiter, FL. He recently spoke at the week-long 2015 Southern Comfort Conference that was held in Florida recently. The main topic that was discussed by him was that of FFS surgery. During this time, he answered numerous questions and showed results of his surgery to attendants of the conference as well.
The Southern Comfort Conference has been developed in order for individuals who are transgender (and their families) to learn more about 'coming out' and to obtain information about how to live life successfully as a member of their respective communities. An extensive array of events and activities are planned each year so that first time and regular attendees are well catered for.
Dr. Mardirossian is able to perform a wide range of FFS surgery procedures on transgender candidates, enabling them to obtain the looks they desire. Women who feel that they do not look feminine enough can also have these surgeries performed. These procedures include a range of shaving and contouring options, brow lifts, hairline advancement, face lift procedures and many more.
Further information about Dr. Mardirossian can be obtained here: http://palmbeachplastics.com .
Information about the Southern Comfort Conference can be found here: http://southerncomfortconference.org/ .
About Dr. Vartan Mardirossian
Dr. Vartan Mardirossian is an FFS surgery specialist who operates from the Jacobson & Mardirossian Plastic Surgery Center for Excellence in Florida. He is double board certified and has performed thousands of facial feminization procedures. His practice is situated at 600 Heritage Drive Suite 220, Jupiter, FL and appointments can be scheduled by calling 561-624-0900 or by filling out the contact form on the surgery's website .
